      columnId - The new column of the card
      Returns:

    • changePositionsOfAffectedCards

      public List<Card> changePositionsOfAffectedCards(int oldPos, int newPos, long columnId)
      Helper method for changing the position of a card. It updates all the positions of the affected cards
      Parameters:
      oldPos - Old position of the card that was changed
      newPos - New position of the card that was changed
      columnId - id of the column where this happens
      Returns:
      The new list with all the updated cards

    • editCardPosition

      public Card editCardPosition(long cardId, int newPos)
      Change a position of a Card in the Column it is in, and change the positions of other Cards in the Column which have been affected by the position change. Store all the position changes in the database
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the Card whose position needs to be changed
      newPos - the new intended position for the card
      Returns:
      the new updated card

    • deleteCard

      public Card deleteCard(long cardId)
      Delete a card from the database and updates the positions of affected cards.
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the card that is to be deleted
      Returns:
      the card that was deleted

    • changeSubtaskPosition

      public Card changeSubtaskPosition(long cardId, int oldPos, int newPos)
      Changes the position of a subtask and shifts all affected subtasks to the left
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the card the subtask is in
      oldPos - position of the subtask
      newPos - new position of the subtask
      Returns:
      the updated card

    • deleteSubtask

      public Card deleteSubtask(long cardId, long subtaskId)
      Deletes a subtask from the card
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the card the subtask is in
      subtaskId - id of the subtask to be deleted
      Returns:
      the updated card without that subtask
